dmca.title: Music DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
The following message has been automatically forwarded to your
address for consultation, based on the contents of the message.

Replies to this message will be returned to the Trakken system,
and not sent to the customer.  A customer service agent will review
the information you provide, and compose a response to the customer,
if necessary.

For more information on this ticket, click the link below:
http://trax/html/trax.html?ticket_id=830487974

Thanks for your help.

The text of the message follows, and the full message is attached.


Original Message Follows:
------------------------
From: "Silvia" 
Subject: â€œUnauthorized Distribution of Copyrighted APCM MÃ©xico A. C.â€
Date: Wed, 6 Jul 2011 13:37:16 -0500







ATTN: BLOGGER LEGAL SUPPORT â€“ 

DMCA COMPLAINTS (+16509633255)
COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT 



We hereby declare that APCM MÃ©xico - AsociaciÃ³n Protectora de Cine y MÃºsica A.C. - is the authorized representative of SONY BMG MUSIC ENTERTAINMENT MEXICO; EMI MUSIC MEXICO; UNIVERSAL MUSIC MEXICO; WARNER MUSIC MEXICO; DISNEY RECORDS; READER'S DIGEST  MEXICO, UNIVISON MUSIC; AZTECA RECORDS representing the music industry worldwide; COLUMBIA PICTURES INDUSTRIES, INC.; DISNEY ENTERPRISES, INC.; PARAMOUNT PICTURES CORPORATION; TRISTAR PICTURES, INC.; TWENTIETH CENTURY FOX FILM CORPORATION; UNITED ARTISTS PICTURES, INC.; UNITED ARTISTS CORPORATION; UNIVERSAL CITY STUDIOS, LLLP; WARNER BROS. ENTERTAINMENT INC., on behalf of the Motion Picture Association (MPA) in MÃ©xico.



1. The copyrighted works at issue are the ones listed in the column "Work" in the attached pages, whose rights are owned individually by our member companies.



2. The referred to copyrighted works are, respectively, being illegally made available for download through the permalinks listed in the column "Permalink" in the attached pages.



3. It is important to mention that the Blog's sole purpose is to illegally make copyright-protected works available for download, without the copyright owner's authorization. Despite the fact that each infringing post is identified through its permalink, we would like to request that the entire blog hosted at:

http://ziroanime-cl.blogspot.com



be taken down.



4. We may be contacted through the numbers, address and e-mail address indicated at the dow of this page.



5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.



6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.





------------------------------------------------
Silvia GarduÃ±o
Internet Anti Piracy APCM MÃ©xico

sgarduno@apcm.org.mx

Col. Polanco Chapultepec, Del Miguel Hidalgo

Phones: 52816351, 52811519, 52810951
